text: William Jennings Sheffield, Jr. (June 26, 1928 â€“ November 4, 2022) was an American Democratic politician. He was the fifth Governor of Alaska from 1982 to 1986. Sheffield's term as governor was marked by controversy including attempts to have him impeached. He was born in Spokane, Washington. He died at his Anchorage home on November 4, 2022. He was 94.National Governors Association-Gov.
